name: Secrets of the Pyramid of Light
overview: A dedicated archeologist, you find yourself deep in the menacing, uncharted jungles of Mexico. To your surprise, you discover a village inhabited by the direct descendants of the Aztecs. To them you are the God that was to arrive from the outside world and fulfill a prophecy. They take you to the Sacred Pyramid of Light where you are forced to enter, thust confronting the Ancient secrets that lie deep in this mysterious structure. Find the secret to the Pyramid or perish.
